K12D0362_H0371:122b-21: snying po aar yig dag kyang de bzhin yang dag
K12D0362_H0371:122b-23: ao yig 'jig rten mgon po aa yang de bzhin
K12D0362_H0371:122b-24: 'dir ni rnam par sel bar 'gyur te lus la'o
K12D0362_H0371:122b-25: // aa yig chos kyi dbyings su 'gyur te nges
K12D0362_H0371:122b-26: par de bzhin a'a: yig las skyes sgra yi rdo
K12D0362_H0371:122b-27: // rje ma // aee yig reg bya rdo rje
K12D0362_H0371:122b-28: ma ste lus kyi dbye bas a'ar yig las skyes
K12D0362_H0371:122b-30: ao yig gzugs kyi rdo rje mar 'gyur nges par
K12D0362_H0371:122b-31: de bzhin aa yig las skyes dri yi rdo rje
K12D0362_H0371:123a-1: ldan bzang po chos kyi dbyings dang phyag na rdo
K12D0362_H0371:123a-2: rje dang ni sgra yi rdo rje ma dag zung
K12D0362_H0371:123a-3: // nam mkha'i snying po dri yi rdo rje ma
K12D0362_H0371:123a-4: dang 'jig rten mgon po ro yi rdo rje ma
K12D0362_H0371:123a-5: // dag zung // sa yi snying po gzugs kyi
K12D0362_H0371:123a-6: rdo rje ma dang reg bya rnam par sel ba
K12D0362_H0371:123a-8: de ltar rigs ni drug po rnams dag rang bzhin
K12D0362_H0371:123a-9: yon tan dbang gis yang dag par ni rig par
K12D0362_H0371:123a-10: bya // hi yig gtsug tor 'khor lo can 'gyur
K12D0362_H0371:123a-11: lus kyi dbang gis 'dir ni ha:yig shin tu sngon
K12D0362_H0371:123a-12: bya // mo'o // ha yig thung ngu gnod mdzes
K12D0362_H0371:123a-13: su 'gyur nges par de bzhin ring po las skyes
K12D0362_H0371:123a-14: drag po'i mig ma'o; ;yam l'a:rim pa rab tu gsal
K12D0362_H0371:123a-15: ba shin tu stobs dang rengs byed ma ste gnyis
K12D0362_H0371:123a-17: ram w'a:rmugs byed dang rgyal ma ste wam dang r'a:zhes pa ni khengs byed rmugs byed mar 'gyur ro //
K12D0362_H0371:123a-18: lam ya: rengs byed shin tu brtson 'grus mar 'gyur
K12D0362_H0371:123a-19: ya wa ra la dbyug pa sngon po mi g-yo
K12D0362_H0371:123a-20: ba // 'dod pa dang ni mtha' yas brtson 'grus
K12D0362_H0371:123a-21: su 'gyur lus kyi dbang gis lha mo rnams kyi
K12D0362_H0371:123a-22: ba // ring po ste // y'a w'a r'a la
K12D0362_H0371:123a-23: de bzhin glang po rta dang seng+ge dang ni phag
K12D0362_H0371:123a-25: dbyug sngon 'od zer can dang mi g-yo zhes dang
K12D0362_H0371:123a-26: khro gnyer can ma brtson 'grus mtha' yas lcags sgrog
K12D0362_H0371:123a-27: ma // 'dod pa tsund'a zung du 'gyur te mi
K12D0362_H0371:123a-28: bdag dkyil 'khor la ni bde ba dam pa'i don
K12D0362_H0371:123a-29: ma // du'o // aa yig dag dang aam dang
K12D0362_H0371:123a-30: rnam par bcad pa ham dang ha:dang ha h'a las
K12D0362_H0371:123b-1: bum pa rnams la de bzhin ha yig rlung dang
K12D0362_H0371:123b-2: me dang chu dang sa yi dbyangs kyis phye bar
K12D0362_H0371:123b-3: 'gyur // aom h'um ho a'a:dud dang dri med yon
K12D0362_H0371:123b-4: tan nor bu dang ni rkang 'thung chos kyi gandi
K12D0362_H0371:123b-5: 'gyur // 'o // ha yig ts'a mund'i ste ham
K12D0362_H0371:123b-6: dang ha: zhes bya ba 'dir ni dbang phyug ma
K12D0362_H0371:123b-7: 'gyur // 'o // dang phag mo'o // h'a dang ksha ksh'a ksh'am ksha:/
K12D0362_H0371:123b-8: dbang mo mkha' 'gro'i bdag pos 'gro mtshangs ma dpal mo gzhon nu ma //
K12D0362_H0371:123b-9: h'i hr'i h'u hl'i rgyab tu padma mchog gi 'dab ma la ste thung ngu'i dbyangs rnams mdun du'o //
K12D0362_H0371:123b-10: kshi kshr'i ksh'u kshl'i de bzhin nyid de rab tu
K12D0362_H0371:123b-11: gsal zhing nges par thung ngu'i dbyangs rnams de bzhin
K12D0362_H0371:123b-12: no // shar dang g-yas dang g-yas min chu dang
K12D0362_H0371:123b-13: me dang lha min dbang ldan dang ni rlung gi
K12D0362_H0371:123b-14: no // padma la // 'dab ma drug la ya
K12D0362_H0371:123b-15: sogs dbyangs drug gis phye thung du ring po rnams
K12D0362_H0371:123b-16: ni rim par yongs bkod pa //
K12D0362_H0371:123b-17: hi kshi la sogs la mtha' thams cad nor ni
K12D0362_H0371:123b-18: gdengs can gyis bsgyur lha mo rnams kyi 'dab ma
K12D0362_H0371:123b-19: la // rigs kyi dbang gis mngon phyogs tsa mund'i
K12D0362_H0371:123b-20: la sogs pa'i thabs su 'gyur te sngags kyi dbye
K12D0362_H0371:123b-21: la // bas so // tam na: brgya byin chu
K12D0362_H0371:123b-22: gter gdong ste pam ma: zhes pa rgya mtsho dang
K12D0362_H0371:123b-23: ni dpal ldan tshogs kyi dbang //
K12D0362_H0371:123b-24: tam na: me dang gzhon nu dag ste tsam dang
K12D0362_H0371:123b-25: nya:zhes bya ba srin po'i dbang po dag dang rlung
K12D0362_H0371:123b-26: // kam nga:khyab 'jug dus te 'phrog byed ces dang
K12D0362_H0371:123b-27: nor sbyin dag kyang sam dang 'dir ni thka:nyid do
K12D0362_H0371:123b-28: // // tsa sogs sde ba dbyangs dang bcas pa
K12D0362_H0371:123b-29: rnams ni lha yi padma'i 'dab mar lha mo rnams
K12D0362_H0371:124a-0: // // kyir 'gyur // nag pa'i zla ba sogs @124a *//
K12D0362_H0371:124a-1: kyi tshes rnams dus kyi nges pa'i dbang gis stong pa drug dang me yi grangs //
K12D0362_H0371:124a-2: de nyid la zhon ha yig rlung me chu dang
K12D0362_H0371:124a-3: sa rnams dag la shar la sogs pa'i klu rnams
K12D0362_H0371:124a-4: kyi // sde bdun brtsegs pa la gnas ksha ya
K12D0362_H0371:124a-5: ra wa lar ldan dur khrod du ni lha min
K12D0362_H0371:124a-6: kyi // mo rnams kyi // shes rab thabs kyi
K12D0362_H0371:124a-7: lus dang bsam pas rigs kyi dbang las 'dir ni
K12D0362_H0371:124a-8: gang zhig dbus su mngon phyogs 'gyur; ;dpal ldan rdo
K12D0362_H0371:124a-9: rje can dang kun bzang rigs kyi dbang gis rdo
K12D0362_H0371:124a-10: rje 'dzin pa phyag na rdo rjer 'gyur //
K12D0362_H0371:124a-11: don yod grub dang nam mkha'i snying po dri med
K12D0362_H0371:124a-12: nor bu'i phyag dang sa yi snying po yang dag
K12D0362_H0371:124a-13: go // phyag na 'khor lo rnam par sel bar
K12D0362_H0371:124a-14: 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis 'od dpag med dang
K12D0362_H0371:124a-15: go // 'jig rten mgon // dpal ldan yum dang
K12D0362_H0371:124a-16: chos kyi dbyings te sgra yi rdo rje ma dang
K12D0362_H0371:124a-17: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma //
K12D0362_H0371:124a-18: dpal ldan sgrol ma reg bya rdo rje ma ste
K12D0362_H0371:124a-19: rigs kyi dbye bas gos dkar ro yi rdo rje
K12D0362_H0371:124a-20: ma // m'a ma k'i dang gzugs zhes grags par
K12D0362_H0371:124a-21: 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis spyan ma dri yi
K12D0362_H0371:124a-22: rdo rje ma; ;khro bo'i dbang po rdo rje shugs
K12D0362_H0371:124a-23: dang rgyal ba'i bdag por 'gyur te kun tu bzang
K12D0362_H0371:124a-25: gtsug tor mi bskyod pa nyid 'dir ni slar yang
K12D0362_H0371:124a-26: shin tu stobs dang don yod grub par rab tu
K12D0362_H0371:124a-27: grags // rmugs byed dang ni phyag na rin chen
K12D0362_H0371:124a-28: du 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis khengs byed dang ni
K12D0362_H0371:124a-29: grags // 'od dpag med // rengs byed dang ni
K12D0362_H0371:124a-30: rnam par snang mdzad du 'gyur stobs ldan phyag na
K12D0362_H0371:124b-0: @124b rdo rje dag dang gnod mdzes so //
K12D0362_H0371:124b-1: mkha' snying dang ni dbyug pa sngon po rang bzhin
K12D0362_H0371:124b-2: yon tan dbang gis sa yi snying po 'dod pa'o
K12D0362_H0371:124b-3: // rnam par sel dang shin tu brtson 'grus su
K12D0362_H0371:124b-4: 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis 'jig rten mgon po mi
K12D0362_H0371:124b-5: // g-yo ba // yum dang khro bo'i dbang po'i
K12D0362_H0371:124b-6: phyag rgyar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis chos kyi
K12D0362_H0371:124b-8: stong par grags pa shin tu sngon mo rlung me
K12D0362_H0371:124b-9: chu dang sa la sogs pa mtha' yas brtson 'grus
K12D0362_H0371:124b-10: dang // rmugs byed ma dang khengs ma rengs byed
K12D0362_H0371:124b-11: mar ni rim pas rab tu gsal zhing nges par
K12D0362_H0371:124b-12: dang // rab tu grags // drag spyan sgra yi
K12D0362_H0371:124b-13: rdo rje mar 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis lcags sgrog
K12D0362_H0371:124b-14: ma dang reg bya rdo rje ma //
K12D0362_H0371:124b-15: 'od zer can dang dri yi rdo rjer rab tu
K12D0362_H0371:124b-16: 'gyur te khro gnyer can dang tsund'ar rab grags pa
K12D0362_H0371:124b-17: // rigs kyi dbye bas nges par ro yis rdo
K12D0362_H0371:124b-18: rje ma dang gzugs kyi rdo rjer rim pas shes
K12D0362_H0371:124b-19: // par bya // 'dir ni rengs byed dus mthar
K12D0362_H0371:124b-20: byed pa nyid de slar yang shin tu stobs dang
K12D0362_H0371:124b-22: rmugs byed shes rab mthar byed dag tu rab tu
K12D0362_H0371:124b-23: 'gyur te de bzhin khengs byed dang ni padma'i dgra
K12D0362_H0371:124b-24: // rlung me chu sa tsa mund'i dang phag mo
K12D0362_H0371:124b-25: dbang phyug ma dang de bzhin dbang mo bzhi pa
K12D0362_H0371:124b-26: // ste // dri dang gzugs dang ro dang reg
K12D0362_H0371:124b-27: bya zhes pa g-yo ba 'phrog byed lha min mer
K12D0362_H0371:124b-29: tshangs pa dang ni rnam par snang mdzad du 'gyur
K12D0362_H0371:124b-30: rigs kyi dbang gis rgya mtsho dag dang 'od dpag
K12D0362_H0371:125a-0: med // me dang dpal ldan phyag ni rin chen du 'gyur rlung dang don @125a *//
K12D0362_H0371:125a-1: yod grub pa dang ni de bzhin nyid //
K12D0362_H0371:125a-2: mi bskyod pa dang lha min dgra bor 'gyur te
K12D0362_H0371:125a-3: rgyal ba'i bdag po dang ni bde byed rab tu
K12D0362_H0371:125a-4: grags // rnam par sel ba gang de brgya byin
K12D0362_H0371:125a-5: du 'gyur 'jig rten mgon po tshogs kyi bdag po
K12D0362_H0371:125a-6: grags // de bzhin nyid // sa yi snying po
K12D0362_H0371:125a-7: gdong drug par 'gyur dpal ldan mkha' snying da nu'i
K12D0362_H0371:125a-8: bdag por rab tu grags pa yin //
K12D0362_H0371:125a-9: dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje dus su 'gyur te
K12D0362_H0371:125a-10: drug pa kun tu bzang po nor gyi bdag po'o
K12D0362_H0371:125a-11: // rig ma drug dang phyag rgya drug ni rang
K12D0362_H0371:125a-12: bzhin yon tan dbang gis de rnams rang rang phyag
K12D0362_H0371:125a-13: // rgya ste // phyag rgya rig ma la sogs
K12D0362_H0371:125a-14: nyi ma lha yi mchog gi bdag rnams dkar po
K12D0362_H0371:125a-16: de dag rnams kyi pad 'dab la ni nor lag
K12D0362_H0371:125a-17: chos te mchu yi zla ba la sogs gang de
K12D0362_H0371:125a-18: rnams // zla ba drug ni snga ma drug tu
K12D0362_H0371:125a-19: 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis lha mo rnams kyi
K12D0362_H0371:125a-20: rnams // phyi ma yang // klu brgyad gang de
K12D0362_H0371:125a-21: bum pa rnams te khyab bdag padma'i 'dab la nus
K12D0362_H0371:125a-22: ma de rnams rab gtum ma //
K12D0362_H0371:125a-23: dpal ldan du ba bya rog gdong mar 'gyur te
K12D0362_H0371:125a-24: rigs kyi dbang gis bya rgod gdong ma smig rgyu
K12D0362_H0371:125a-25: ma // mkha' snang ma ni 'ug pa'i gdong ma
K12D0362_H0371:125a-26: dpal ldan mar me mkha' 'gro'i bdag po'i gdong mar
K12D0362_H0371:125a-27: ma // rab tu grags // nag mo 'bar ma
K12D0362_H0371:125a-28: khyi gdong ma ste dmar mo 'bar ma shin tu
K12D0362_H0371:125a-29: rnam 'gyur bzhin ldan phag gdong ma //
K12D0362_H0371:125a-30: dkar mo 'bar ma stag gi gdong mar 'gyur te
K12D0362_H0371:125a-31: rigs kyi dbang gis ser mo 'bar ma lce spyang
K12D0362_H0371:125b-0: ma // @125b de bzhin sgeg mo la sogs thams
K12D0362_H0371:125b-1: cad rab tu gsal ba rnam bcu sna tshogs yum
K12D0362_H0371:125b-2: ma // ni lhag ma'o // lha mo sangs rgyas
K12D0362_H0371:125b-3: rig ma shing dang bcas shing bum pa dang bcas
K12D0362_H0371:125b-4: rgyal ba yi ni dag pa'i sku; ;khro bo 'di
K12D0362_H0371:125b-5: dbang po byang chub sems dpa' nges par ro yi
K12D0362_H0371:125b-6: rdo rje ma ni chos kyi sku de nyid //
K12D0362_H0371:125b-7: rnal 'byor ma rnams longs spyod sku ste rab mchog
K12D0362_H0371:125b-8: shing rta la gnas lha ni nyi mar rab grags
K12D0362_H0371:125b-9: pa // klu ni brgyad po rnams dang rab gtum
K12D0362_H0371:125b-10: ma rnams 'khor dang bcas pa sangs rgyas kyi ni
K12D0362_H0371:125b-11: pa // sprul pa'i sku // de bzhin slar yang
K12D0362_H0371:125b-12: rgyal ba'i sku ni dbye ba gnyis su 'gyur te
K12D0362_H0371:125b-13: phyi rol dag dang nag na yang //
K12D0362_H0371:125b-14: mngal nas skyes pa ji lta ba nyid de bzhin
K12D0362_H0371:125b-15: kho na dkyil 'khor la ni nges par rab tu
K12D0362_H0371:125b-16: 'gyur // ston pa lha mo sogs dang bum pa
K12D0362_H0371:125b-17: lhan skyes rgyal ba'i sku ste dkyil 'khor snying po'i
K12D0362_H0371:125b-18: 'gyur // dbus su'o // sangs rgyas la sogs chos
K12D0362_H0371:125b-19: kyi sku ste nges par ro yi rdo rje ma
K12D0362_H0371:125b-20: sogs longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku //
K12D0362_H0371:125b-21: khro bo sprul pa'i sku ru 'gyur te yon tan
K12D0362_H0371:125b-22: dbang gis dkyil 'khor gyi ni snying por yang dag
K12D0362_H0371:125b-23: gnas // phyi rol du ni tsa mund'i la sogs
K12D0362_H0371:125b-24: pa lha mo brgyad po 'khor dang bcas pa dag
K12D0362_H0371:125b-25: gnas // pa'i sku // lha la sogs pa chos
K12D0362_H0371:125b-26: kyi sku ste mtha' dag gdengs can rigs kyang 'di
K12D0362_H0371:125b-27: ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku //
K12D0362_H0371:125b-28: gtum mo rnams ni sprul pa'i skur 'gyur mi yi
K12D0362_H0371:125b-29: bdag po sems can kun gyi don gyi slad du'o
K12D0362_H0371:125b-30: // sku yi rdo rje lhan cig skyes pa'i sku
K12D0362_H0371:125b-31: ni zung du 'gyur te gzugs ni rdzogs pa'i slad
K12D0362_H0371:126a-1: gi rdo rje dang ni chos kyi sku yang zung du 'gyur te chos nyid bstan pa'i don du'o //
K12D0362_H0371:126a-2: thugs dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yang zung du
K12D0362_H0371:126a-3: 'gyur te sems can kun gyi don ni byed pa
K12D0362_H0371:126a-4: po // ye shes dang ni sprul pa'i sku dag
K12D0362_H0371:126a-5: zung du 'gyur te srog chags rnams la thar ba
K12D0362_H0371:126a-6: po // ster ba nyid // shes rab thabs kyi
K12D0362_H0371:126a-7: lus dang bsam pa mnyam dang mi mnyam rigs ni
K12D0362_H0371:126a-8: nyi zla aa sogs ka sogs dang //
K12D0362_H0371:126a-9: rnam gsum srid pa la gnas ye shes rnam shes
K12D0362_H0371:126a-10: dbye ba dag gis rnal 'byor pa yis rig par
K12D0362_H0371:126a-11: bya // rdo rje sv'a h'a'i mtha' ldan dag gis
K12D0362_H0371:126a-12: mgo dang mgrin pa snying ga lte ba gsang ba
K12D0362_H0371:126a-13: bya // spyi bor te // 'di dag gis ni
K12D0362_H0371:126a-14: byin rlabs yan lag rab mchog rgyal ba'i bdag po
K12D0362_H0371:126a-15: lha mo rnams kyis bkru bar bya //
K12D0362_H0371:126a-16: stong pa chos kyi dbyings dang rdo rje gsum gyi
K12D0362_H0371:126a-17: dus dang ye shes mchod pa rjes su chags pa
K12D0362_H0371:126a-18: la // skyabs su 'gro ba gsum nas sgrub pa
K12D0362_H0371:126a-19: pos yis tad sv'a bha ba a'atma ko ham brjod
K12D0362_H0371:126a-20: la // par bya // bum par rnams dang du
K12D0362_H0371:126a-21: ba la sogs brgyad po rnams kyis snying gar chos
K12D0362_H0371:126a-23: rigs ma rnams dang sangs rgyas nyid kyis mgo bor
K12D0362_H0371:126a-24: rtsibs bcu drug pa lhan cig skyes par rab tu
K12D0362_H0371:126a-25: grags // byang chub sems dpa' la sogs nyis 'gyur
K12D0362_H0371:126a-26: mi bdag rnams kyis mgrin par longs spyod rdzogs pa'i
K12D0362_H0371:126b-0: nor ni gdengs can dag gis @126b bsgyur ba rnams
K12D0362_H0371:126b-1: kyis lte bar sprul pa'i 'khor lor 'gyur //
K12D0362_H0371:126b-2: lag pa rkang pa'i tshigs la lha rnams kyi ni
K12D0362_H0371:126b-3: las kyi 'khor lo dgu bcu dus kyis bsnun pa
K12D0362_H0371:126b-4: ste // klu dang gtum mo mi yi bdag po
K12D0362_H0371:126b-5: rnams kyis sor mo'i tshigs kyi mtshams la bya ba
K12D0362_H0371:126b-6: ste // zhes byar 'gyur // dus kyi dag pas
K12D0362_H0371:126b-7: dpal ldan rdo rje can 'gyur mi bdag lo dang
K12D0362_H0371:126b-8: zla ba la sogs dbye bas so //
K12D0362_H0371:126b-9: thugs kyi rnam pa nyi ma ma yin nyin zhag
K12D0362_H0371:126b-10: so so'i dbang gis sna tshogs yum ni rnam par
K12D0362_H0371:126b-11: dag / rlung gi dag pas du ba la sogs
K12D0362_H0371:126b-12: rang gi snying ga'i padmar rtsa yi 'khor lo la
K12D0362_H0371:126b-13: dag / gnas rnams // nyon mongs rnams kyis drag
K12D0362_H0371:126b-14: po chung mar bcas pa khyab bdag zhabs kyi 'og
K12D0362_H0371:126b-15: tu bdud kyi tshogs kyis bdud //
K12D0362_H0371:126b-16: dung dang gand'i ma ni ljon pa zhes pa dag
